name: Downbound
description:
An endless faller for your enjoyment, player sprite made by the lovely Penusbmic ( https://penusbmic.itch.io/). 

# Controls

Left and Right to move

Spacebar to Umbrella

ONLINE SCOREBOARD!!

Web may not work on MacOS/iOS devices, it's an issue with Godot and that operating system.

This project was supposed to have on screen controls and be playable on mobile, I'll add support if I can find the time!
